title: Emma in Love
description: Emma goes back to Edinburgh to study, and to look after her brother Richard. She likes her new independence and the chance to organize the lives of everyone around her.... Everyone that is, except Alastair - whose absence leaves her miserable and whose presence torments her.Emma hates the creature she's become - pleading for more attention and love, jealous of all his other interests. Being in love is more pain than pleasure until the old Emma begins to take charge... and then the sparks fly!
author: Honor Arundel
